recentInsights.title: AI Model Validation Section Shows High Drop-off Rate
recentInsights.description: Users are abandoning assessments at the AI Model Validation section 65% of the time, indicating complexity issues
recommendations: Break down complex validation requirements into smaller steps
Add interactive tutorials for technical concepts
Implement progress saving to reduce abandonment fear

recentInsights.title: Data Science Persona Shows Highest Completion Rates
recentInsights.description: Users with Data Science background complete assessments 40% faster with 25% higher scores
recommendations: Create Data Science-specific assessment paths
Leverage their expertise for peer mentoring programs
Use their patterns to improve other persona experiences

recentInsights.title: FDA AI Governance Compliance Scores Declining
recentInsights.description: Average compliance scores for FDA AI Governance have dropped 15% over the last month
recommendations: Update FDA guidance materials with latest requirements
Implement automated compliance checking
Provide expert consultation for complex cases

recentInsights.title: Peak Usage Times Cause Response Delays
recentInsights.description: System response times increase by 40% during 2-4 PM EST, affecting user experience
recommendations: Implement auto-scaling during peak hours
Add load balancing for database queries
Consider caching frequently accessed data

recentInsights.title: Question Clarity Improvements Show Positive Results
recentInsights.description: Recent question rephrasing in Data Governance section increased completion rate by 18%
recommendations: Apply similar clarity improvements to other sections
Implement user feedback collection on question clarity
Create question review process for new content
